meanings.definition: A type of aromatic compound found in citronella oil.
meanings.sent1: Citronellals give citronella oil its pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: I added a few drops of citronellals to the diffuser for a fresh scent.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the bottle of citronellals, creating a fragrant mess.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the sweet aroma of citronellals, like a field of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: As I inhaled the citronellals, memories of summer picnics flooded my mind.

meanings.sent1: The store had run out of citronellals, so I couldn't buy any.
meanings.sent2: I bought two bottles of citronellals for my essential oils collection.
meanings.sent3: The citronellals on the shelf seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the scent of citronellals, like a garden in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The citronellals sparkled in the sunlight, casting a fragrant spell over the room.
